statements: DELETE FROM vehicle_health_data WHERE vehicle_id = 1 AND engine_temperature > 100
DELETE FROM vehicle_health_data WHERE oil_pressure < 30 AND last_maintenance_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
DELETE FROM VehicleHistory WHERE vehicle_id = 3 AND mechanic_id = 2;
DELETE FROM maintenance_history WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
DELETE FROM maintenance_history WHERE maintenance_type = 'major' AND vehicle_id = 123;
